description: This source file defines API endpoints for managing recipes, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and rating recipes. It uses FastAPI for routing and SQLAlchemy for database interactions.

classes.name: RecipeRating
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing a recipe rating.

methods.name: _apply_filters( query, search: Optional[str], tags: Optional[List[str]], cuisine: Optional[str], difficulty: Optional[str], min_time: Optional[int], max_time: Optional[int], )
methods.description: Applies optional filters to the recipes query based on search parameters like tags, cuisine, difficulty, and time.

methods.name: list_recipes( search: Optional[str] = None, tags: Optional[List[str]] = Query(default=None), cuisine: Optional[str] = None, difficulty: Optional[str] = None, min_time: Optional[int] = None, max_time: Optional[int] = None, sort: Optional[str] = "newest", page: Optional[int] = 1, page_size: Optional[int] = 20, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of recipes with optional filtering and sorting.

methods.name: create_recipe( recipe: RecipeCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Creates a new recipe entry associated with the authenticated user.

methods.name: get_recipe(recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Fetches a recipe by its unique ID.

methods.name: update_recipe( recipe_id: int, data: RecipeUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Updates an existing recipe if the current user is the owner.

methods.name: delete_recipe( recipe_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Deletes a recipe if the current user is the owner.

methods.name: rate_recipe( recipe_id: int, rating: RatingCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Creates or updates a rating for a recipe by the current user and updates the average rating.
